verses.verse: עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> when מִשְׁמַרְתִּ֣י <S%H4931><s%> upon my watch אֶעֱמֹ֔דָה <S%H5975><s%> I will stand וְאֶֽתְיַצְּבָ֖ה <S%H3320><s%> and set עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> when מָצ֑וֹר <S%H4692><s%> me upon the tower וַאֲצַפֶּ֗ה <S%H6822><s%> and will watch לִרְאוֹת֙ <S%H7200><s%> to see מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> what יְדַבֶּר־ <S%H1696><s%> what he will say בִּ֔י וּמָ֥ה <S%H4100><s%> and how אָשִׁ֖יב <S%H7725><s%> unto me and what I shall answer עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> when תּוֹכַחְתִּֽי׃ <S%H8433><s%> when I am reproved

וַיַּעֲנֵ֤נִי <S%H6030><s%> answered יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD וַיֹּ֔אמֶר <S%H559><s%> me and said כְּת֣וֹב <S%H3789><s%> Write חָז֔וֹן <S%H2377><s%> the vision וּבָאֵ֖ר <S%H874><s%> and make [it] plain עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַלֻּח֑וֹת <S%H3871><s%> upon tables לְמַ֥עַן <S%H4616><s%> because of יָר֖וּץ <S%H7323><s%> that he may run ק֥וֹרֵא <S%H7121><s%> that readeth בֽוֹ׃

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for ע֤וֹד <S%H5750><s%> is yet חָזוֹן֙ <S%H2377><s%> For the vision לַמּוֹעֵ֔ד <S%H4150><s%> [is] yet for an appointed time וְיָפֵ֥חַ <S%H6315><s%> it shall speak לַקֵּ֖ץ <S%H7093><s%> but at the end וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and it will not יְכַזֵּ֑ב <S%H3576><s%> and not lie אִם־ <S%H518><s%> Though יִתְמַהְמָהּ֙ <S%H4102><s%> though it tarry חַכֵּה־ <S%H2442><s%> wait ל֔וֹ כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for בֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> for it because it will surely יָבֹ֖א <S%H935><s%> come לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> it will not יְאַחֵֽר׃ <S%H309><s%> it will not tarry

הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold עֻפְּלָ֔ה <S%H6075><s%> [which] is lifted up לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> is not יָשְׁרָ֥ה <S%H3474><s%> is not upright נַפְשׁ֖וֹ <S%H5315><s%> Behold his soul בּ֑וֹ וְצַדִּ֖יק <S%H6662><s%> in him but the just בֶּאֱמוּנָת֥וֹ <S%H530><s%> by his faith יִחְיֶֽה׃ <S%H2421><s%> shall live

וְאַף֙ <S%H637><s%> Furthermore כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הַיַּ֣יִן <S%H3196><s%> by wine בּוֹגֵ֔ד <S%H898><s%> Yea also because he transgresseth גֶּ֥בֶר <S%H1397><s%> man יָהִ֖יר <S%H3093><s%> [he is] a proud וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> never יִנְוֶ֑ה <S%H5115><s%> neither keepeth at home אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> he הִרְחִ֨יב <S%H7337><s%> who enlargeth כִּשְׁא֜וֹל <S%H7585><s%> as hell נַפְשׁ֗וֹ <S%H5315><s%> his desire וְה֤וּא <S%H1931><s%> he כַמָּ֙וֶת֙ <S%H4194><s%> and [is] as death וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> never יִשְׂבָּ֔ע <S%H7646><s%> and cannot be satisfied וַיֶּאֱסֹ֤ף <S%H622><s%> but gathereth אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> to himself כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> unto him all nations וַיִּקְבֹּ֥ץ <S%H6908><s%> and heapeth אֵלָ֖יו <S%H413><s%> to himself כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעַמִּֽים׃ <S%H5971><s%> unto him all people

הֲלוֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not אֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> of these כֻלָּ֗ם <S%H3605><s%> all עָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> against מָשָׁ֣ל <S%H4912><s%> a parable יִשָּׂ֔אוּ <S%H5375><s%> Shall not all these take up וּמְלִיצָ֖ה <S%H4426><s%> against him and a taunting חִיד֣וֹת <S%H2420><s%> proverb ל֑וֹ וְיֹאמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> against him and say ה֚וֹי <S%H1945><s%> Woe הַמַּרְבֶּ֣ה <S%H7235><s%> to him that increaseth לֹּא־ <S%H3808><s%> not ל֔וֹ עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against מָתַ֕י <S%H4970><s%> long וּמַכְבִּ֥יד <S%H3513><s%> [that which is] not his how long? and to him that ladeth עָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> against עַבְטִֽיט׃ <S%H5671><s%> himself with thick clay

הֲל֣וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not פֶ֗תַע <S%H6621><s%> suddenly יָק֙וּמוּ֙ <S%H6965><s%> Shall they not rise up נֹשְׁכֶ֔יךָ <S%H5391><s%> that shall bite וְיִקְצ֖וּ <S%H6974><s%> arise מְזַעְזְעֶ֑יךָ <S%H2111><s%> that shall vex וְהָיִ֥יתָ <S%H1961><s%> become לִמְשִׁסּ֖וֹת <S%H4933><s%> thee and thou shalt be for booties לָֽמוֹ׃

כִּֽי <S%H3588><s%> Because אַתָּ֤ה <S%H859><s%> you שַׁלּ֙וֹתָ֙ <S%H7997><s%> Because thou hast spoiled גּוֹיִ֣ם <S%H1471><s%> nations רַבִּ֔ים <S%H7227><s%> many יְשָׁלּ֖וּךָ <S%H7997><s%> shall spoil כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All יֶ֣תֶר <S%H3499><s%> all the remnant עַמִּ֑ים <S%H5971><s%> of the people מִדְּמֵ֤י <S%H1818><s%> blood אָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> thee because of men's וַחֲמַס־ <S%H2555><s%> and [for] the violence אֶ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land קִרְיָ֖ה <S%H7151><s%> of the city וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all יֹ֥שְׁבֵי <S%H3427><s%> and of all that dwell בָֽהּ׃ פ

ה֗וֹי <S%H1945><s%> Woe בֹּצֵ֛עַ <S%H1214><s%> to him that coveteth בֶּ֥צַע <S%H1215><s%> covetousness רָ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> an evil לְבֵית֑וֹ <S%H1004><s%> to his house לָשׂ֤וּם <S%H7760><s%> that he may set בַּמָּרוֹם֙ <S%H4791><s%> on high קִנּ֔וֹ <S%H7064><s%> his nest לְהִנָּצֵ֖ל <S%H5337><s%> that he may be delivered מִכַּף־ <S%H3709><s%> from the power רָֽע׃ <S%H7451><s%> of evil

יָעַ֥צְתָּ <S%H3289><s%> Thou hast consulted בֹּ֖שֶׁת <S%H1322><s%> shame לְבֵיתֶ֑ךָ <S%H1004><s%> to thy house קְצוֹת־ <S%H7096><s%> by cutting off עַמִּ֥ים <S%H5971><s%> people רַבִּ֖ים <S%H7227><s%> many וְחוֹטֵ֥א <S%H2398><s%> and hast sinned נַפְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <S%H5315><s%> [against] thy soul

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> Surely אֶ֖בֶן <S%H68><s%> For the stone מִקִּ֣יר <S%H7023><s%> of the wall תִּזְעָ֑ק <S%H2199><s%> shall cry out וְכָפִ֖יס <S%H3714><s%> and the beam out מֵעֵ֥ץ <S%H6086><s%> of the timber יַעֲנֶֽנָּה׃ <S%H6030><s%> shall answer פ

ה֛וֹי <S%H1945><s%> Woe בֹּנֶ֥ה <S%H1129><s%> to him that buildeth עִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> a town בְּדָמִ֑ים <S%H1818><s%> with blood וְכוֹנֵ֥ן <S%H3559><s%> and stablisheth קִרְיָ֖ה <S%H7151><s%> a city בְּעַוְלָֽה׃ <S%H5766><s%> by iniquity

הֲל֣וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not הִנֵּ֔ה <S%H2009><s%> indeed מֵאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Behold [is it] not of the LORD צְבָא֑וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts וְיִֽיגְע֤וּ <S%H3021><s%> shall labour עַמִּים֙ <S%H5971><s%> that the people בְּדֵי־ <S%H1767><s%> in the very אֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> fire וּלְאֻמִּ֖ים <S%H3816><s%> and the people בְּדֵי־ <S%H1767><s%> themselves for very רִ֥יק <S%H7385><s%> empty יִעָֽפוּ׃ <S%H3286><s%> shall weary

כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for תִּמָּלֵ֣א <S%H4390><s%> shall be filled הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> For the earth לָדַ֖עַת <S%H3045><s%> with the knowledge אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כְּב֣וֹד <S%H3519><s%> of the glory יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD כַּמַּ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> as the waters יְכַסּ֥וּ <S%H3680><s%> cover עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and יָֽם׃ <S%H3220><s%> the sea ס

ה֚וֹי <S%H1945><s%> Woe מַשְׁקֵ֣ה <S%H8248><s%> drink רֵעֵ֔הוּ <S%H7453><s%> unto him that giveth his neighbour מְסַפֵּ֥חַ <S%H5596><s%> that puttest חֲמָתְךָ֖ <S%H2573><s%> thy bottle וְאַ֣ף <S%H637><s%> even שַׁכֵּ֑ר <S%H7937><s%> to [him] and makest [him] drunken לְמַ֥עַן <S%H4616><s%> So הַבִּ֖יט <S%H5027><s%> also that thou mayest look עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on מְעוֹרֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H4589><s%> on their nakedness

שָׂבַ֤עְתָּ <S%H7646><s%> Thou art filled קָלוֹן֙ <S%H7036><s%> with shame מִכָּב֔וֹד <S%H3519><s%> for glory שְׁתֵ֥ה <S%H8354><s%> drink גַם־ <S%H1571><s%> Now אַ֖תָּה <S%H859><s%> yourself וְהֵֽעָרֵ֑ל <S%H6188><s%> thou also and let thy foreskin be uncovered תִּסּ֣וֹב <S%H5437><s%> shall be turned עָלֶ֗יךָ <S%H5921><s%> and כּ֚וֹס <S%H3563><s%> the cup יְמִ֣ין <S%H3225><s%> right hand יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD'S וְקִיקָל֖וֹן <S%H7022><s%> unto thee and shameful spewing עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon כְּבוֹדֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3519><s%> [shall be] on thy glory

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For חֲמַ֤ס <S%H2555><s%> For the violence לְבָנוֹן֙ <S%H3844><s%> of Lebanon יְכַסֶּ֔ךָּ <S%H3680><s%> shall cover וְשֹׁ֥ד <S%H7701><s%> thee and the spoil בְּהֵמ֖וֹת <S%H929><s%> of beasts יְחִיתַ֑ן <S%H2865><s%> [which] made them afraid מִדְּמֵ֤י <S%H1818><s%> blood אָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> because of men's וַחֲמַס־ <S%H2555><s%> and for the violence אֶ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land קִרְיָ֖ה <S%H7151><s%> of the city וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all יֹ֥שְׁבֵי <S%H3427><s%> and of all that dwell בָֽהּ׃ ס

מָֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> What הוֹעִ֣יל <S%H3276><s%> What profiteth פֶּ֗סֶל <S%H6459><s%> the graven image כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> when פְסָלוֹ֙ <S%H6458><s%> thereof hath graven יֹֽצְר֔וֹ <S%H3336><s%> of his work מַסֵּכָ֖ה <S%H4541><s%> it the molten image וּמ֣וֹרֶה <S%H3384><s%> and a teacher שָּׁ֑קֶר <S%H8267><s%> of lies כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> when בָטַ֞ח <S%H982><s%> trusteth יֹצֵ֤ר <S%H3335><s%> that the maker יִצְרוֹ֙ <S%H3335><s%> that the maker עָלָ֔יו <S%H5921><s%> and לַעֲשׂ֖וֹת <S%H6213><s%> therein to make אֱלִילִ֥ים <S%H457><s%> idols אִלְּמִֽים׃ <S%H483><s%> dumb ס

ה֣וֹי <S%H1945><s%> Woe אֹמֵ֤ר <S%H559><s%> unto him that saith לָעֵץ֙ <S%H6086><s%> to the wood הָקִ֔יצָה <S%H6974><s%> Awake ע֖וּרִי <S%H5782><s%> Arise לְאֶ֣בֶן <S%H68><s%> stone דּוּמָ֑ם <S%H1748><s%> to the dumb ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> it יוֹרֶ֔ה <S%H3384><s%> it shall teach הִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> behold ה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> it תָּפוּשׂ֙ <S%H8610><s%> Behold it [is] laid זָהָ֣ב <S%H2091><s%> over with gold וָכֶ֔סֶף <S%H3701><s%> and silver וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all ר֖וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> and [there is] no breath אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> and there בְּקִרְבּֽוֹ׃ <S%H7130><s%> at all in the midst

וַֽיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> But the LORD בְּהֵיכַ֣ל <S%H1964><s%> temple קָדְשׁ֑וֹ <S%H6944><s%> [is] in his holy הַ֥ס <S%H2013><s%> keep silence מִפָּנָ֖יו <S%H6440><s%> before כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> let all the earth פ
